context.description: This page alows you to select a .warproduct file which will be used for the export.

contexts.context: This page reports validation errors. An exported WAR file may not work as expected when errors exist. If you know what you'r doing, you can export the WAR product anyway. concept/warproduct.htmarproductExport.html" label="WAR Product Export"/>

context.description: This page allows you to export a WAR product to a destination outside the Eclipse workspace
This page allows you to create a new WAR product configuration and initialize its content.
Select plug-ins and libraries belonging to the WAR product.
This page allows you to specify general information about the WAR product, as well as validate and export it.
